Ankheg.name: Chitan Crush
Ankheg.text: The Ankheg chitters as you are crushed between two giant mandible pincers.

Awakened Tree.name: Branch Slam
Awakened Tree.text: A storm of spores are released from the Awakened Tree that is corrosive to your flesh.

Azer.name: Forge
Azer.text: You are crushed by a superheated forgehammer, the broken bones dwarfed only by your incindiary wounds.

Bandit Captain.name: Shank
Bandit Captain.text: What needs to be said? The Bandit Lord beats you up good.

Berserker.name: Primal Cleave
Berserker.text: The Berserker explodes in a bloodthirsty fury, cleaving flesh from bone in a storm of attacks.

Black Dragon Wyrmling.name: Red Flame
Black Dragon Wyrmling.text: The Wyrmling rears back and releases a shower of venom breath over you.

Bronze Dragon Wyrmling.name: Copper Flame
Bronze Dragon Wyrmling.text: The Wyrmling trips you and smashes in your chest with a powerful tail slam.

Centaur.name: Ranged Assault
Centaur.text: The Centaur takes a flank and launches bolt after bolt into your armor.

Cult Fanatic.name: Dirk
Cult Fanatic.text: The Fanatic slices their flesh with a curved dagger and swiftly sends spikes of magic blood into your shoulder.

Druid.name: Druidic Magic
Druid.text: The Druid summons the denizens of the forest to rend your flesh, slash your legs, chew on your skin.

Ettercap.name: Spore
Ettercap.text: You stumble over a bog trap as the Ettercap launches out and sinks two razor sharp fangs into your leg.

Gargoyle.name: Slash
Gargoyle.text: The Gargoyle springs from a derelict stoop and surprises you with a powerful slash.

Gelatinous Cube.name: Devour
Gelatinous Cube.text: You are engulfed by the Cube, the pain is insurmountable as you are slowly digested.

Ghast.name: Nightmare
Ghast.text: The Ghast clings to you, ripping away at flesh with teeth, claw, and bone.

Giant Boar.name: Gore
Giant Boar.text: The Boar charges you, goring you with over-sized tusks.

Giant Constrictor Snake.name: Constrict
Giant Constrictor Snake.text: You become entangled as your living trap becomes tighter and tighter.

Gibbering Mouther.name: Shriek
Gibbering Mouther.text: A grotesque and otherwordly screech pierces your ears

Green Dragon Wyrmling.name: Envenom
Green Dragon Wyrmling.text: The Wyrmling rears back and releases a shower of venom breath over you.

Grick.name: Clamp
Grick.text: The Grick grabs hold of you with four powerful tentacles and gnashes at your chest

Griffon.name: Swoop
Griffon.text: The Griffon swoops down at blinding speed and slashes you with razor sharp talons

Hunter Shark.name: Maul
Hunter Shark.text: Within the pool of blood, the Hunter Shark is king.

Merrow.name: Spear Throw
Merrow.text: The blood in the water grows thick as you receive a spear into your chest.

Mimic.name: Toothy Grin
Mimic.text: That wasn't a chest. This isn't treasure.

Minotaur Skeleton.name: Nether Slam
Minotaur Skeleton.text: If the real thing wasn't powerful enough, the skeleton version holds an unearthly power as you already know.

Ochre Jelly.name: Acid Spray
Ochre Jelly.text: The Ochre slings a mucousy material that swiftly burns through armor and flesh

Ogre.name: Mindless Slam
Ogre.text: The giant club was real hardwood. And it hurt.

Ogre Zombie.name: Undead Slam
Ogre Zombie.text: The giant club is also undead. And it hurts.

Pegasus.name: Skystrike
Pegasus.text: The Pegasus slams down on you from the sky, smashing you with diamond hooves

Plesiosaurus.name: Hydro Spike
Plesiosaurus.text: A piercing bullet of water runs through you shoulder and explodes a boulder behind you.

Rhino.name: Gore
Rhino.text: The Rhino charges, unfettered by all objects between you.

Saber Toothed Tiger.name: Bite
Saber Toothed Tiger.text: If it's not the claws, its the teeth. Oh god its the teeth.

Sea Hag.name: Drowning Slash
Sea Hag.text: The Hag mutters as you feel your insides twist.

Silver Dragon Wyrmling.name: Plasma Shot
Silver Dragon Wyrmling.text: The Wyrmling rears back and sprays you with superheated plasma.

Swarm Of Poisonous Snakes.name: Literally Poison
Swarm Of Poisonous Snakes.text: The swarm quickly descends on you, bite after bite, you feel your flesh decay.

Wererat.name: Infected Bite
Wererat.text: The Wererat bites you... you feel a strange affinity for the full moon.

White Dragon Wyrmling.name: Lightning Breath
White Dragon Wyrmling.text: The Wyrmling clamps on to you as you feel 50,000 volts course through your body.

Will O Wisp.name: Doomed Chase
Will O Wisp.text: You chase the wisp, unsuspecting a pit filled with spikes beneath you.
